user.title: Omnisense Login Credentials
user.description: Please enter your username and password to proceed to the next step.

data.omnisense_login_failed: Login failed. Please check your credentials and try again.
data.failed_to_get_sites: Failed to get sites. Please try again.
data.no_sensors_selected: No sensors selected. Please select at least one sensor to proceed.

select_site.description: Choose one or more sites from the list below and click 'Submit' to proceed.

sensors.title: Select Sensors
sensors.description: Select the sensors you wish to monitor and click 'Submit' to finish the setup.
